cardindex.title: Character Card Library
cardindex.description: The most complete source of scanned Super Dungeon Explore character cards on the Internet. Search, filter and download high resolution scans of every hero, monster, creep and NPC released by Soda Pop Miniatures.

cardindex.title: Hero Guide
cardindex.description: A resource dedicated to understanding the heroes of Crystalia, including strategy guides, hero rankings, and team composition recommendations. An invaluable resource for every budding adventurer in Crystalia.

cardindex.title: Consul Guide
cardindex.description: A respository of useful information for dungeon masters to better understand the monsters, bosses and spawns found across Crystalia.

cardindex.title: Arcade Mode
cardindex.description: A library of scanned cards for Super Dungeon Explore: Arcade mode. An invaluable resource for players that like to adventure solo or as co-op against an automated consul.

cardindex.title: Complete SDE Product List
cardindex.description: A complete list of all Super Dungeon Explore products released to retail. Use this to plan your future purchases or to admire the size of your collection.

cardindex.title: The game tiles of Crystalia
cardindex.description: From the soggy lowland of Glauerdoom Moor to the volcanic mountains of Dragonback Peaks, explore the many lands of Crystalia with these high resolution scans of all the currently released Super Dungeon Explore game tiles.

cardindex.title: SDE Card Builder
cardindex.description: A wonderful card creator tool designed by community member James Adam. Use this online tool to build custom characters, treasure, explore cards and more!

cardindex.title: The rules of the land
cardindex.description: A collection of rulebook downloads including the official Soda Pop rules, together with a collection of custom rulesets written by members of the community.

cardindex.title: SDE Compendium Discussion
cardindex.description: Want to get involved? Have some material you want to share? Then swing by the forums and join the campfire discussion on the development of this community resource.

cardindex.title: Legends Campaign
cardindex.description: A collection of resouces to support the Legends campaign mode of Super Dungeon Explore. After all, there is more to see in Crystalia than just dungeons and monsters.

cardindex.title: Treasures and gold
cardindex.description: A reference list of Crystalia's greatest treasures, pulled from many fearesome Booty chests and scanned for your viewing pleasure.
